Class DynamicVoltageAndFrequencyScalingMethod

java.lang.Object
dynamicVoltageAndFrequencyScalingMethod.DynamicVoltageAndFrequencyScalingMethod
Direct Known Subclasses:
BATS, BS, BTS, CSMS, DUAL, MaxSpeed, None
public abstract class DynamicVoltageAndFrequencyScalingMethod extends Object
Abstract base class for dynamic voltage and frequency scaling methods.
Author:
ShiuJia
